mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_organ_message ( SCHOOL_ID, CHECK_CONTENT, PICTURE_PATH, CREATE_USER_ID, CREATE_DATA ) VALUE ( #{schoolId}, #{checkContent}, #{picturePath}, #{createUserId}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT t.ID id, t.SCHOOL_ID schoolId, (SELECT b.SCHOOL_NAME FROM t_sys_school b where b.ID=t.SCHOOL_ID) schoolName, t.CHECK_CONTENT checkContent, t.PICTURE_PATH picturePath, t.CREATE_USER_ID createUserId, t.CREATE_DATA createDate, t.UPDATE_USER_ID updateUserId, t.UPDATE_DATA updateDate FROM t_organ_message t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG='1' ORDER BY t.CREATE_DATA DESC
